Package pl.put.poznan.sorting.logic

Interface SortingAlgorithm

All Known Implementing Classes:
BogoSort, BubbleSort, MergeSort, QuickSort, SelectionSort, ShellSort
public interface SortingAlgorithm
SortingAlgorithm interface defines the contract for sorting algorithms that can be implemented to sort an array with a specified number of iterations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    sort(int[] arr, int iterations, long timeLimit)
    Sorts the given int array in place using the implemented sorting algorithm.
    long
    sort(String[] arr, int iterations, long timeLimit)
    Sorts the given String array in place using the implemented sorting algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • sort

      long sort(int[] arr, int iterations, long timeLimit)
      Sorts the given int array in place using the implemented sorting algorithm.
      Parameters:
      arr - the int array to be sorted
      iterations - the number of iterations to perform during the sorting process; if 0 or negative algorithms sort the entire array
      timeLimit - the maximum time allowed in nanoseconds for the sorting process; if 0 or negative algorithmss sort without time limit
      Returns:
      the time taken in nanoseconds to sort the array, or the time elapsed if the sorting is stopped by time limit

    • sort

      long sort(String[] arr, int iterations, long timeLimit)
      Sorts the given String array in place using the implemented sorting algorithm.
      Parameters:
      arr - the String array to be sorted
      iterations - the number of iterations to perform during the sorting process; if 0 or negative algorithms sort the entire array
      timeLimit - the maximum time allowed in nanoseconds for the sorting process; if 0 or negative algorithmss sort without time limit
      Returns:
      the time taken in nanoseconds to sort the array, or the time elapsed if the sorting is stopped by time limit
